author: cctrieloff
msg: This patch requires svn 817742, corrects the lock issue for ring queue in 817742, and protects replication when used together with flow to disk

author: shanti
msg: Fix for OLIO-127. Fix as described in JIRA.
Fix for OLIO-81. Previous fix of raising the min. to 1 second proved insufficient. AddPerson now has a min. cycle time of 2 secs and AddEvent has 3 secs.

author: trawick
msg: Fix a make install DESTDIR problem handling the reference manual.

This only affected our 2.3.1 beta release.
